name: Dice and Sorcery
description:
Fight slimes and clear the dungeon with dice and sorcery!
Work your way through the levels gaining upgrades.
GMTK 2022 Submission! Art by @cosmylk.

  • Hover over skills to see range of current skill.
  • Skill will be "X"ed out if unusable.
  • Drag dice into empty slots to use skills & movement.
  • Hover over enemies to see potential zones of danger.
  • Clear enemies to complete the level.
  •   Jumps and causes AOE damage.
  •   Charges in a line.
  •  Causes lightning to strike.

Known Bugs:

  • Ending Doesn't play correctly. There are 5 stages.
  • Cannot continue playing the game after pausing.
  • Selecting "Add a die that rolls 2, 3 and 4, and remove one that rolls 1, 2, 3" will lead to a die becoming invisible.
  • Boss stage doesn't happen.

These will be fixed once voting ends.
